comment.author: 9537324@N02
comment._content: Translation: Shoe factory Jan van Arendonk, Tilburg. Description: "Cutting the overleather by 16 and 17 year old students. The boy on the left has the easiest job: from scrap he cuts along a ruler the narrow lines to decorate the edges. The boy on the right is one stage further: he cuts the leather inside for the flaps [unreadable]. [unreadable] use the original material to the ultimate.
